name: 91Squarefeet
headline: Software and Service to build offices and Retail Shops
description:
91Squarefeet is solving the coordination problem in interior projects. These projects require high-frequency coordination over a small time window, and we have found a neat solution. 

Our tech, Rdash.io, onboarded 150 organizations in its first 12 months. ICICI Bank, Shopper Stop, and Simpliwork use it for project tracking, subcontracting, and procurement. Monthly, $15Mn projects are created and $5Mn procurement happens on Rdash. Companies that are using Rdash typically save 10% in their fit-out expenditure. 

On the back of this tech, we have scaled our business of building offices and retail shops to $10Mn Annualised Revenue. We have built 1100+ offices and retail shops for MongoDB, HSBC, Calvin Klein, and 60 other customers.

founders.name: Amit Bansal, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder and CEO at 91Squarefeet. 

I am a Civil Engineering graduate and worked as a structural designer at WSP. I have done postgraduate in supply chain management and had a short stint at Madura Fashion (The largest fashion retailer in India) before co-founding quifers.com. Quifers is a logistics SaaS platform for big enterprises that got acquired in May 2021 in an all-cash deal.

founders.name: Puneet Bansal, Founder
founders.description:
Product Person
I did my graduation in Civil engineering from IIT Delhi in 2012 and worked at WSP as a facilities designer-BIM professional for retail, mall, and engineering projects of UK and middle-east.
I took to startup journey by joining Quifers ( a logistics a SAAS platform) as product manager in 2017. 
In 2019, I co-founded 91Squarefeet.

founders.name: Amit Mishra, Founder
founders.description: I am a first-generation serial entrepreneur with an interest in the Retail, Logistics, and AI sector. I completed my B.Tech. from IIT Roorkee in 2010 and worked as the Founder and CEO of Quifers which is a SaaS-based logistics automation technology company. Recently, Quifers was acquired by a Logistics MNC giving a successful exit to Founders and Investors.  In 2019, I co-founded 91Squarefeet.

### What makes us different?
##### [ Started in 2019  ](https://www.91squarefeet.com/<#>)
##### [ 100+ Clients  ](https://www.91squarefeet.com/<#>)

This gives us a 360 degree visibility on the project progress, enables us to plan ahead, and makes us the fastest fitouts contractor in India. Finally, we embrace a full-stack approach, and as a result, we do not subcontract our jobs. We heavily invest in upskilling the manpower we deploy on our projects and purchase materials directly from OEMs to ensure better quality and control. This enables us to have a better control over project timelines and work quality.

### 60 days journey from Design to final Handover
Site Survey  AI Layout  Design Management  Proposals & BOQ  Work Progress  Audit & Handover 
#### Conduct site surveys with RDash Recce 
Our office team configures survey needs to be done by filed team via mobile app. Mobile app guides field team to capture Spaces, Measurements, technical details & observations. Real time survey details shared back to office teams. 
[ Contact Us ](https://www.91squarefeet.com/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aopen%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6Ijc0NjEiLCJ0b2dnbGUiOmZhbHNlfQ%3D%3D>)
![](https://91squarefeet.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Group-22782@2x-1024x781.webp)
#### AI Led Layout Generation
Our AI technology, at the forefront of innovation, streamlines floor space arrangements to an unparalleled degree. Employing advanced algorithms and machine learning, our system scrutinizes spatial layouts, foot traffic trends, and user preferences, curating environments that are both highly functional and aesthetically pleasing. 
[ Contact Us ](https://www.91squarefeet.com/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aopen%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6Ijc0NjEiLCJ0b2dnbGUiOmZhbHNlfQ%3D%3D>)
![](https://91squarefeet.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/ezgif-3-ef5d1e0bc8.gif)
#### Project Designs management workflow​ 
Our designs are approved & Managed on tech platform that are accessible to field team’s Mobile app. Field teams can raise issues and ask for clarifications ( RFIs). Experience a hassle free way to manage & iterate designs.
[ Contact us ](https://www.91squarefeet.com/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aopen%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6Ijc0NjEiLCJ0b2dnbGUiOmZhbHNlfQ%3D%3D>)
![](https://91squarefeet.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Group-22915@2x-1024x719.webp)
#### Project Estimates & Budget 
Review & Manage your list of scope items with quantities and rates. We manage proposal approvals, track change orders & monitor the project budget to deliver quick and hassle free client experience.
[ contact us ](https://www.91squarefeet.com/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aopen%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6Ijc0NjEiLCJ0b2dnbGUiOmZhbHNlfQ%3D%3D>)
![](https://91squarefeet.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Group-22784@2x-1024x745.webp)
#### Track Real Progress
Track Activity wise & value wise progress of work by field team. Get Daily update on Work items, activities, manpower & obstacles.
[ contact us ](https://www.91squarefeet.com/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aopen%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6Ijc0NjEiLCJ0b2dnbGUiOmZhbHNlfQ%3D%3D>)
![](https://91squarefeet.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Group-22916@2x-1024x759.webp)
#### Clean Project Closure & Handover
We capture all pending issues as snaglist and track their closure. We record joint measurements and arrive at final billables.

### What makes us different?
#####  Started in 2019  ⟨16⟩
#####  100+ Clients  ⟨16⟩
We have digitally integrated the fit-out supply chain across factories, OEMs, labour contractors, and architects. This gives us a 360 degree visibility on the project progress, enables us to plan ahead, and makes us the fastest fitouts contractor in India. Finally, we embrace a full-stack approach, and as a result, we do not subcontract our jobs. We heavily invest in upskilling the manpower we deploy on our projects and purchase materials directly from OEMs to ensure better quality and control. This enables us to have a better control over project timelines and work quality.

### 60 days journey from Design to final Handover
Site Survey  AI Layout  Design Management  Proposals & BOQ  Work Progress  Audit & Handover 
#### Conduct site surveys with RDash Recce 
Our office team configures survey needs to be done by filed team via mobile app. Mobile app guides field team to capture Spaces, Measurements, technical details & observations. Real time survey details shared back to office teams. 
 Contact Us ⟨15⟩
![](https://91squarefeet.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Group-22782@2x-1024x781.webp)
#### AI Led Layout Generation
Our AI technology, at the forefront of innovation, streamlines floor space arrangements to an unparalleled degree. Employing advanced algorithms and machine learning, our system scrutinizes spatial layouts, foot traffic trends, and user preferences, curating environments that are both highly functional and aesthetically pleasing. 
 Contact Us ⟨15⟩
![](https://91squarefeet.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/ezgif-3-ef5d1e0bc8.gif)
#### Project Designs management workflow​ 
Our designs are approved & Managed on tech platform that are accessible to field team’s Mobile app. Field teams can raise issues and ask for clarifications ( RFIs). Experience a hassle free way to manage & iterate designs.
 Contact us ⟨15⟩
![](https://91squarefeet.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Group-22915@2x-1024x719.webp)
#### Project Estimates & Budget 
Review & Manage your list of scope items with quantities and rates. We manage proposal approvals, track change orders & monitor the project budget to deliver quick and hassle free client experience.
 contact us ⟨15⟩

Track Activity wise & value wise progress of work by field team. Get Daily update on Work items, activities, manpower & obstacles.
 contact us ⟨15⟩

### 91Squarefeet: Transforming Spaces through Technology and Innovation

**Company Overview**
Founded in 2021 and based in Gurugram, India, 91Squarefeet specializes in providing software solutions and services aimed at streamlining office and retail shop construction processes. The firm emerged from the recognition of a pressing issue: the intricate coordination required for interior projects, which demand rapid communication and oversight.

**Tech Edge: Rdash.io**
Central to their success is **Rdash.io**, a cutting-edge platform for project tracking, procurement, and subcontracting. In just its first year, Rdash onboarded 150 organizations, including prominent names like **ICICI Bank** and **Shopper Stop**. With approximately $15 million in projects created and $5 million in procurement managed monthly, users of Rdash typically enjoy a remarkable 10% savings on their fit-out expenditures.

**Business Scale and Achievements**
Leveraging this technology, 91Squarefeet has scaled rapidly, achieving an annualized revenue of $10 million and successfully delivering over **1,100 projects** for diverse clients such as **MongoDB, HSBC,** and **Calvin Klein**. The differentiation lies in their direct approach—91Squarefeet keeps the entire fit-out process in-house, eschewing subcontractors in favor of investing heavily in workforce training and direct procurement from Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs).

**Mission and Core Services**
The mission of 91Squarefeet revolves around **“Software and Service to build offices and Retail Shops.”** Their offerings include:

1. **Office Fitouts**: Ensuring high-quality fit-outs with efficient turnaround times.
2. **Turnkey Retail Fitouts**: An all-in-one solution that guarantees speedy project completion.
3. **Retail Identity Design**: Creating shopping experiences that align with consumer behaviors and aesthetics.
4. **Project Financing**: Providing financial services related to fit-out projects.

As seen on their website, they claim impressive metrics:
- **500+ projects delivered**
- **100+ cities covered**
- A commendable **zero percent on-time delivery failure rate.**

**The Team and Leadership**
91Squarefeet boasts a dynamic team of **180 employees**, complemented by the mentorship of Michael Seibel as their Group Partner through Y Combinator's Batch W22. 

**Looking Ahead**
With a commitment to technological innovation and workforce empowerment, 91Squarefeet is poised for continued growth. They are actively hiring 500 Project Management Specialists and 100 architects by the end of 2025, reinforcing their mission to simplify commercial fit-outs in India.

For more information about their projects or to get in touch, check out their [website](https://www.91squarefeet.com/).

In summary, 91Squarefeet is not just building physical spaces; they are reshaping the landscape of how commercial projects are conceived, managed, and executed—one square foot at a time. This approach makes them a compelling case study in blending technology with traditional industries.
